sqlMap.update:
update ${FINPRO}.REP_REQ
REP_DESC = #REP_DESC# CONS_PAR = #CONS_PAR# REPCON = #REPCON# DQJG = #DQJG# STATE = #STATE# REP_SQL = #REP_SQL#
where REQ_NO = #REQ_NO:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.sql:
select REQ_NO, REPMOD_NO, a.user_name CHECKIN_USER, CHECKIN_DEPT, b.ORG_NAME CHECKIN_ORGAN, CHECKIN_TIME, STATE, CONS_PAR, REP_DESC, REPCON, REP_SQL ,DQJG,CONJG from ${FINPRO}.REP_REQ u left join YTPUB.USER_INFO a on u.CHECKIN_USER=a.user_id left join YTPUB.ORGAN b on u.CHECKIN_ORGAN =b.ORG_NO
ORDER BY REQ_NO DESC
sqlMap.select: select count(1) rows from ${FINPRO}.REP_REQ u where substr(CHECKIN_TIME,1,10) = #CHECKIN_TIME:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ${FINPRO}.REP_REQ(REQ_NO, REPMOD_NO, CHECKIN_USER, CHECKIN_DEPT, CHECKIN_ORGAN,CHECKIN_TIME, STATE, CONS_PAR, REP_DESC, REPCON, REP_SQL,DQJG,CONJG) values(#REQ_NO#, #REPMOD_NO#, #CHECKIN_USER#,#CHECKIN_DEPT#,#CHECKIN_ORGAN#,#CHECKIN_TIME:VARCHAR:NULL#,#STATE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CONS_PAR:VARCHAR:NULL#,#REP_DESC:VARCHAR:NULL#,#REPCON:VARCHAR:NULL#,#REP_SQL:VARCHAR:NULL#,#DQJG:VARCHAR:NULL#,#CONJG:VARCHAR:NULL#)
sqlMap.select: select REQ_NO, u.REPMOD_NO, a.user_name CHECKIN_USER, u.CHECKIN_DEPT, b.ORG_NAME CHECKIN_ORGAN, u.CHECKIN_TIME, u.STATE, CONS_PAR, u.REP_DESC, REPCON, REP_SQL ,REP_NO, REP_NAME from ${FINPRO}.REP_REQ u left join ${FINPRO}.REP_MOD c on u.REPMOD_NO=c.REPMOD_NO left join YTPUB.USER_INFO a on u.CHECKIN_USER=a.user_id left join YTPUB.ORGAN b on u.CHECKIN_ORGAN =b.ORG_NO where REQ_NO = #REQ_NO:VARCHAR#
select (case when max(substr(REQ_NO,-4,4)) is null then '' else max(substr(REQ_NO,-4,4)) end) maxIndex from ${FINPRO}.REP_REQ u where substr(CHECKIN_TIME,1,10) = #CHECKIN_TIME:VARCHAR#
